title: 欢呼吧，　万圣节资料篇新鲜出炉　　》
author: 包大仙゜
txt_content:
The Halloween Update is out!The minecraft.net server is a bit overwhelmed at the moment, so you might not be able to get in immediately.
There’s a whole pile of new content in this update, and a bunch of bugs in multi player got fixed. Here’s what I managed to fit in:

Next up, I will take a couple of days off, then get started on survival mode multiplayer and make a push towards reaching Beta. I will also finish moving minecraft.net over to the much faster server and DDOS protection I signed up for last week.
We’ll move in to our fancy new offices slightly ahead of schedule, on November 15. Initially, it’ll be just me, Daniel and Jakob, but about two weeks later, Jeb and <SECRET ARTIST NAME WITHHELD UNTIL HE’S QUIT HIS JOB> will join us


　　万圣节资料篇来啦～


官网的服务器有点招架不住了, 所以你不一定能在第一时间玩到.
这次更新了一大堆新内容, 一些多人模式的BUG也被修复了喔 !
以下是我努力做到的,
Explore a scary new realm! A brand new hell world for fast travel. Portal in, move ten meters, portal out, and you're hundreds of meters away.
探索恐怖的新领域！一个用于快速穿行的崭新地狱。进入以后走十米再出来，你会发现自己身处几百米以外的地方。

Fight scary new monsters! Actually difficult this time around.
对付可怕的新怪兽！这次实际上很难打败。

Experience scarier depths! The deeper you are, the brighter it has to be to stay safe.
体验更骇人的深度！随着深度的增加，你必须不断加强照明才能保持安全。

Be scared of the dark! Torches will die after a while. Use flint and steel to reignite, or place lanterns that last forever.
惧怕黑暗！火把会在燃烧一段时间后熄灭，需要使用打火装置重新点着。也可以使用不会熄灭的灯笼。
这个还没完成~!

Catch scary fish! Or possibly just regular fish.
捕捉恐怖的鱼！也可能只是普通的鱼。

Scare other players online! Less bugs, more implemented features.
吓唬其他在线玩家！更少的bug，更多的实用特性。

Carve scary jack-o-lanterns! Pumpkins can also be worn as totally useless helmets.
雕刻恐怖的杰克南瓜灯！南瓜也可以作为没用的头盔戴在头上。

Keep track of the scary time! A craftable watch lets you know when it's safe to emerge from the caves.
掌握时间！可以合成手表，这样你就能知道什么时候从洞穴里出来会比较安全。

AND MORE! Biomes. More music. Better sounds.
还有更多！生物群落。更多音乐。更好的音效。


更多更多更新, 敬请期待 BETA ~!!
接下来, 我要歇几天, 然后开始着手开发多人生存模式并更努力的发展BETA(ALPHA的下一代).
同时, 我会把整个官网转移到快得多的服务器上, 以及我上星期签的DDOS保护.

在11月5号搬进我们精心设计的新办公室会是第一件事.
最初只是我, Daniel和Jakob, 但是再过2周,  Jeb和 (神秘艺术家, 在他辞职之前不能透露名字唷~) 会加入我们...!













btw, 昨天很好玩喔。
